BackstoryDef.title: vatgrown cadet
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood in a growth vat, where [PAWN_nameDef] was drilled in combat skills. This has left them less developed in other ways.

BackstoryDef.title: vatgrown laborer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood in a growth vat, where [PAWN_nameDef] learned manual laboring skills. This has left them less developed in other ways.

BackstoryDef.title: vatgrown leader
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood in a growth vat, where [PAWN_nameDef] was extensively trained in leadership skills.
